analysis.description:
XdacTokenCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0xf126248db756ddb86032febc785f6f24b7f8ede9.sol#447-461) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_contributor,amountToken) (/unique_chucks/6/0xf126248db756ddb86032febc785f6f24b7f8ede9.sol#461)

XdacTokenCrowdsale._sendToken (/unique_chucks/6/0xf126248db756ddb86032febc785f6f24b7f8ede9.sol#483-492) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(_address,_amountTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0xf126248db756ddb86032febc785f6f24b7f8ede9.sol#492)

XdacTokenCrowdsale.transferTokenOwnership (/unique_chucks/6/0xf126248db756ddb86032febc785f6f24b7f8ede9.sol#504-509) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(_newOwner,_token.balanceOf(_token.owner())) (/unique_chucks/6/0xf126248db756ddb86032febc785f6f24b7f8ede9.sol#506-507)

XdacToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/6/0xf126248db756ddb86032febc785f6f24b7f8ede9.sol#276)
